name: Give Care, Take Care
description:
Give Care, Take Care is a simple game really. Go around shooting care at the people around you to make them happy. All of that caring is pretty draining though, and might leave you feeling neglected. Make sure you don't cast that feeling of neglect onto others... unless... that's what you want...

Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6! Theme: Take Care

Check out my YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcBArCJquq4xcAoEyXfBEZQ

Thanks for stopping by!
